mapper.update:
update city
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
abbr = #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_key = #{name_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{area_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
is_map = #{is_map,jdbcType=BIT},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update city set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abbr = #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_key = #{name_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{area_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, is_map = #{is_map,jdbcType=BIT}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
